TITLE: Item Configuration Table Structure - Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Details the configuration options available for individual bookmark items including name, URL, icon settings, and display preferences.
SOURCE: https://github.com/homarr-labs/documentation/blob/master/versioned_docs/version-1.12.0/widgets/bookmarks/index.mdx#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
| Configuration   | Description                                                                                 | Values     | Default Value        |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------- | -------------------- |
| Name            | Name of your bookmark.                                                                      | String     | Homarr Documentation |
| URL             | Link to your bookmark.                                                                      | URL/String | https://homarr.dev   |
| App Icon        | URL or Link to the icon to represent your bookmark.                                         | URL/String | /imgs/logo/logo.png  |
| Open in new tab | If switched, the link will open in a new tab, otherwise it will redirect on the current tab | yes / no   | no                   |
| Hide Hostname   | Hide the link under the the title/name.                                                     | yes / no   | no                   |
| Hide Icon       | Hide the icon of the bookmark (Helps Using less space).                                     | yes / no   | no                   |
```

TITLE: Docker Run Command with Self-Signed Certificate Support
DESCRIPTION: Docker run command for Homarr with environment variables to allow self-signed certificates and encryption key configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/homarr-labs/documentation/blob/master/versioned_docs/version-1.13.1/advanced/proxy/index.mdx#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker run  \
  --name homarr \
  --restart unless-stopped \
  -p 7575:7575 \
  -v ./homarr/appdata:/appdata \
  -e NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 \
  -e SECRET_ENCRYPTION_KEY=your_64_character_hex_string \
  -d ghcr.io/homarr-labs/homarr:latest
```

TITLE: OIDC Authentication Basic Configuration for Authelia
DESCRIPTION: Basic environment variable configuration for connecting Homarr to Authelia as an OIDC provider, showing required parameters for authentication.
SOURCE: https://github.com/homarr-labs/documentation/blob/master/versioned_docs/version-1.13.1/advanced/single-sign-on/index.mdx#2025-04-17_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: docker
CODE:
```
AUTH_PROVIDERS="oidc"
AUTH_OIDC_ISSUER="https://auth.example.com"
AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET="client_secret"
AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_ID="homarr"
AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_NAME="Authelia"
AUTH_OIDC_FORCE_USERINFO="true" --> from v4.39 of authelia and above this is required
```

TITLE: Ingress Configuration
DESCRIPTION: YAML configuration for setting up Ingress with TLS and host routing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/homarr-labs/documentation/blob/master/versioned_docs/version-1.15.0/getting-started/installation/helm.md#2025-04-17_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
service:
  enabled: true
ingress:
  enabled: true
  ingressClassName: "traefik"
  annotations:
  hosts:
    - host: homarr.homelab.dev
      paths:
        - path: /
          pathType: ImplementationSpecific
  tls:
    - hosts:
        - "homarr.homelab.dev"
        - "www.homarr.homelab.dev"
      secretName: homelab-tls
```

TITLE: LDAP Basic Docker Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Example of basic LDAP authentication setup using environment variables in a Docker run command.
SOURCE: https://github.com/homarr-labs/documentation/blob/master/versioned_docs/version-1.12.0/advanced/single-sign-on/index.mdx#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: docker
CODE:
```
docker run ...
AUTH_PROVIDERS="ldap"
AUTH_LDAP_URI="ldap://example.com:3890"
AUTH_LDAP_BASE="dc=example,dc=com" // Same as LLDAP_LDAP_BASE_DN
AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN="uid=admin,ou=People,dc=example,dc=com"
AUTH_LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD="adminpass" // Same as LLDAP_LDAP_USER_PASS
```
